mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMIN.RESERVATION ( RESV_ID, EMP_ID, RESV_ROOM_ID, RESV_TITLE, RESV_WRITER, RESV_DESCRIPTION, RESV_START, RESV_END ) VALUES ( RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{emp_id}, #{resv_room_id}, #{resv_title}, #{resv_writer}, #{resv_description}, TO_DATE(#{resv_start},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{resv_end},'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') )
mapper.select: SELECT RESV_ID , EMP_ID , RESV_ROOM_ID , RESV_TITLE , RESV_WRITER , RESV_DESCRIPTION , RESV_START ,RESV_END FROM RESERVATION r WHERE TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD')<=TO_CHAR(RESV_START,'YYYYMMDD')
